description: Try our easy to follow Witches' Hats recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Witches' Hats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the stems from strawberries to leave a flat base.
Break the chocolate into small pieces and place into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave the chocolate in 30-second bursts until just melted.
Line a tray with baking paper and spread out mint chocolate biscuits.

Insert a bamboo skewer into the top of the strawberry and hold over the bowl of melted chocolate. Use a spoon to drizzle chocolate over the strawberry until entirely covered, allowing excess chocolate to drip back into the bowl.
Carefully transfer the chocolate-covered strawberry on top of a mint chocolate biscuit.
Once all strawberries are used, transfer the tray to the fridge for five minutes or until chocolate is set.
To make the band for the witchesâ€™ hats, combine icing mixture with 1 tbs milk and transfer to a piping bag. Add one drop each of red and yellow food colouring to achieve an orange colour. Mix well.
Using a piping bag (or ziplock bag with the corner snipped off), pipe a band around the base of the strawberry. Keep in the fridge until ready to serve.
